name: My Wonderful Wanda
caption: Bettina Oberli | Switzerland | 2020 | 111 mins
description:
Film available for streaming from April 23 to April 29.
The first 30 people to register using the code CMUIFF will watch for free!
Tickets for the event are no longer on sale.
+ April 29th: Emulate our in-person event by watching the film at 4:00 pm (EDT) and then joining a FREE live discussion via Zoom with Swiss director Bettina Oberli at 6 pm (EDT).
